channel.title: News on John Lapeyre
channel.description: Recent content in News on John Lapeyre

item.title: Broken links
item.description: Switching my site to a new website builder caused several external links to break, including search results linking to old content on the old site, for which internal links had been removed. So, I have been fixing this with aliases, but haven’t made all of them yet. In the mean time, I see that google reacts much more quickly to a radical change in my site than it did 10 years ago.

item.title: JuliaCon 2018
item.description: I’m excited to be giving a talk at JuliaCon 2018 on symbolic computation software in Julia. I’m very curious to hear the perspective on Julia of the highly-distinguished, veteran, keynote speakers Sophie Wilson and Nicholas Higham. … and excited (still) to meet all the brilliant Julia developers and users, … and also about everything else that will be going on.

item.title: New web site
item.description: I switched to a new website framework. Or rather, I began to use one. Till now, I had hand coded html/css borrowed from somewhere. But having managed content makes life easier, even for a simple site. The previous content was a bit wooly from years of accretion and pruning. I more-or-less started fresh. But, I transferred some of the content to the new framework.
